articles.title: LaLiga team-by-team preview: How Spain's top sides stack up to Real Madrid, Barcelona - ESPN India
articles.description: ESPN is your home for all LaLiga matches, replays and highlights. We preview all 20 squads in Spain's top flight and what to look for this season.
articles.content: The 2022-23 LaLiga season begins this week! A lot of has happened since Real Madrid lifted its record-extending 35th league trophy over eternal rivals Barcelona. Madrid also won their 14th Champions … [+51635 chars]
